mapper.select: SELECT ID AS id, BUYER_ID AS buyerId, TEL_NO AS telNo, ACCOUNT_NAME AS accountName, ACCOUNT_PASS AS accountPass FROM by_buyer_account WHERE DEL_FLG = 0 AND BUYER_ID = #{filterMap.buyerId}

SELECT licence.ID AS id, BUYER_ID AS buyerId, LIC_NAME AS licName, LIC_NUMBER AS licNumber, LEGAL_NAME AS legalName, LEGAL_LIC_TYPE AS legalLicType, LEGAL_LIC_NUMBER AS legalLicNumber FROM by_buyer_licence licence WHERE BUYER_ID = #{filterMap.buyerId} AND licence.DEL_FLG = 0

SELECT TER_MARKET_ID AS terMarketId, MARKET_NAME AS marketName, MARKET_LEVEL AS marketLevel, MARKET_LEVEL_NAME AS marketLevelName FROM by_market_terminal WHERE TER_MARKET_ID = #{filterMap.terMarketId} AND DEL_FLG = 0

SELECT FOD_MARKET_ID AS fodMarketId, MARKET_NAME AS marketName, MARKET_TYPE AS marketType, MARKET_TYPE_NAME AS marketTypeName FROM by_market_food WHERE LGCS_AREA_CODE = #{filterMap.lgcsAreaCode} AND CITY_CODE = #{filterMap.cityCode} AND DISTRICT_CODE = #{filterMap.districtCode} AND DEL_FLG = 0

SELECT FOD_MARKET_ID AS fodMarketId, MARKET_NAME AS marketName, MARKET_TYPE AS marketType, MARKET_TYPE_NAME AS marketTypeName FROM by_market_food WHERE FOD_MARKET_ID = #{filterMap.fodMarketId} AND DEL_FLG = 0
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM by_buyer_basic_info WHERE DEL_FLG = '0' AND BUYER_NAME = #{accountName} AND BUYER_ID != #{buyerId}
